oat-banana-pancakes.author: susankim@gmail
oat-banana-pancakes.ingredients: Bananas:1, Oats:1/3 Cup, Salt:1/4 Tsp, Baking Powder:1/2 Tsp, Eggs:1
oat-banana-pancakes.instructions: Mix all ingredients in blender until smooth traditional pancake batter consistency.
oat-banana-pancakes.name: Oat Banana Pancakes
oat-banana-pancakes.optional: Flax or shredded wheat cereal can be used with/instead of oats. You can also add a spoonful of peanut butter and dash of cinnamon.

rothfeld-caeser-salad-dressing.author: dylanrothfeld@gmail
rothfeld-caeser-salad-dressing.ingredients: Garlic:4-10 Cloves, Salt:1/2 Tsp, Lemon Juice:1/3 Cup, Anchovy Paste:2-3 Inches, Dijon Mustard:1 Tbsp, Worcestershire Sauce:1 Tsp, Extra Virgin Olive Oil:1 Cup
rothfeld-caeser-salad-dressing.instructions:
(1) Blend the garlic and salt until smooth paste.
(2) Add the lemon juice, anchovy paste, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce and blend until smooth liquid.
(3) Add olive oil and blend.
rothfeld-caeser-salad-dressing.name: Rothfeld Caeser Salad Dressing
rothfeld-caeser-salad-dressing.optional: Can add 1/2 Tsp during step (2) for extra sweetness. Meyer lemons tend to work best, make sure to remove the seeds.
rothfeld-caeser-salad-dressing.servingSize: Depends on how large of a salad and how heavily dressed you like it!
